description:
**Fix Overview**:

To configure the Windows Update Services (WSUS) correctly for your environment:

1. Set the policy "Specify intranet Microsoft update service location" in your Group Policy Object (GPO) for the devices needing updates.
2. Apply separate GPOs to clients and servers to manage their download and install behavior, as well as user experience and timing.

**Details**:
- This configuration allows devices to locate your intranet WSUS server for updates, ensuring that specific configurations for client and server behaviors are maintained separately. Users should refer to the Microsoft documentation for detailed guidance on policy configuration.: https://admx.help/?category=windows_10_2016&policy=microsoft.policies.windowsupdate::corpwuurl_example_config
